h1501.definition: from an unused root meaning to devour; a kind of locust; palmer-worm.

h1502.definition: from the same as {{h1501}}; devourer; Gazzam, one of the Nethinim; Gazzam.

h1503.definition: from an unused root meaning to cut down (trees); the trunk or stump of a tree (as felled or as planted); stem, stock.

h1504.definition: a primitive root; to cut down or off; (figuratively) to destroy, divide, exclude, or decide; cut down (off), decree, divide, snatch.

h1505.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h1504}}; to quarry; determine; cut out, soothsayer.

h1506.definition: from {{h1504}}; something cut off; a portion; part, piece.

h1507.definition: the same as {{h1506}}; Gezer, a place in Palestine; Gazer, Gezer.

h1508.definition: feminine of {{h1506}}; the figure or person (as if cut out); also an inclosure (as separated); polishing, separate place.

h1509.definition: from {{h1504}}; a desert (as separated); not inhabited.

h1511.definition: (in the m patrial from {{h1507}}; a Gezerite (collectively) or inhabitants of Gezer; but better (as in the text) bytransposition גִּזְרִיxlit Girzîy corrected to Gizrîy; patrial of {{h1630}}; a Grizite (collectively) or member of a native tribe in Palestine; Gezrites.

h1512.definition: probably from {{h1518}}; (compare {{h1521}}); the external abdomen, belly (as the source of the faetus); belly.

h1513.definition: or (feminine) גַּחֶלֶת; from an unused root meaning to glow or kindle; an ember; (burning) coal.

h1514.definition: from an unused root meaning to burn; flame; Gacham, a son of Nahor; Gaham.

h1515.definition: from an unused root meaning to hide; lurker; Gachar, one of the Nethinim; Gahar.

h1516.definition: or (shortened) גַּי; probably (by transmutation) from the same root as {{h1466}} (abbreviated); a gorge (from its lofty sides; hence, narrow, but not a gully or winter-torrent); valley.

h1517.definition: probably from {{h1464}}; a thong (as compressing); by analogy, a tendon; sinew.

h1518.definition: or (shortened) גֹּחַ; a primitive root; to gush forth (as water), generally to issue; break forth, labor to bring forth, come forth, draw up, take out.

h1519.definition: (Aramaic) or (shortened) גּוּחַ; (Aramaic), corresponding to {{h1518}}; to rush forth; strive.

h1520.definition: from {{h1518}}; a fountain; Giach, a place in Palestine; Giah.

h1521.definition: or (shortened) גִּחוֹן; from {{h1518}}; stream; Gichon, a river of Paradise; also a valley (or pool) near Jerusalem; Gihon.

h1522.definition: or גֵּחֲזִי; apparently from {{h1516}} and {{h2372}}; valley of a visionary; Gechazi, the servant of Elisha; Gehazi.

h1523.definition: or (by permutation) גּוּל; a primitive root; properly, to spin round (under the influence of any violent emotion), i.e. usually rejoice, or (as cringing) fear; be glad, joy, be joyful, rejoice.

h1524.definition: from {{h1523}}; a revolution (of time, i.e. an age); also joy; × exceedingly, gladness, × greatly, joy, rejoice(-ing), sort.

h1525.definition: or גִּילַת; feminine of {{h1524}}; joy; joy, rejoicing.

h1526.definition: patrial from {{h1542}}; a Gilonite or inhabitant of Giloh; Gilonite.

h1527.definition: of uncertain derivation; Ginath, an Israelite; Ginath.

h1529.definition: from the same as {{h1487}}; lumpish; Geshan, an Israelite; Geshan.

h1530.definition: from {{h1556}}; something rolled, i.e. a heap of stone or dung (plural ruins), by analogy, a spring of water (plural waves); billow, heap, spring, wave.

h1531.definition: from {{h1556}}; a cup for oil (as round); bowl.

h1532.definition: from an unused root meaning to shave; a barber; barber.

h1533.definition: from {{h1530}} and {{h1158}}; fountain of ebullition; Gilboa, a mountain of Palestine; Gilboa.

h1534.definition: by reduplication from {{h1556}}; a wheel; by analogy, a whirlwind; also dust (as whirled); heaven, rolling thing, wheel.

h1537.definition: the same as {{h1536}} (with the article as a properly, noun); Gilgal, the name of three places in Palestine; Gilgal. See also {{h1019}}.

h1538.definition: by reduplication from {{h1556}}; a skull (as round); by implication, a head (in enumeration of persons); head, every man, poll, skull.

h1539.definition: from an unused root probably meaning to polish; the (human) skin (as smooth); skin.

h1540.definition: a primitive root; to denude (especially in a disgraceful sense); by implication, to exile (captives being usually stripped); figuratively, to reveal; advertise, appear, bewray, bring, (carry, lead, go) captive (into captivity), depart, disclose, discover, exile, be gone, open, × plainly, publish, remove, reveal, × shamelessly, shew, × surely, tell, uncover.

h1541.definition: (Aramaic) or גְּלָא; (Aramaic), corresponding to {{h1540}}; bring over, carry away, reveal.

h1542.definition: or (fully) גִּילֹה; from {{h1540}}; open; Giloh, a place in Palestine; Giloh.

h1543.definition: feminine from {{h1556}}; a fountain, bowl or globe (all as round); bowl, pommel, spring.

h1544.definition: or (shortened) גִּלֻּל; from {{h1556}}; properly, a log (as round); by implication, an idol; idol.

h1546.definition: feminine from {{h1540}}; captivity; concretely, exiles (collectively); (they that are carried away) captives(-ity).

h1548.definition: a primitive root; properly, to be bald, i.e. (causatively) to shave; figuratively to lay waste; poll, shave (off).

h1549.definition: or גִּלְיוֹן; from {{h1540}}; a tablet for writing (as bare); by analogy, a mirror (as a plate); glass, roll.

h1550.definition: from {{h1556}}; a valve of a folding door (as turning); also a ring (as round); folding, ring.

h1551.definition: or (prolonged) גָּלִילָה; the same as {{h1550}}; a circle (with the article); Galil (as a special circuit) in the North of Palestine; Galilee.

h1552.definition: feminine of {{h1550}}; a circuit or region; border, coast, country.

h1553.definition: plural of {{h1552}}; circles; Geliloth, a place in Palestine; Geliloth.

h1554.definition: plural of {{h1530}}; springs; Gallim, a place in Palestine; Gallim.

h1555.definition: perhaps from {{h1540}}; exile; Goljath, a Philistine; Goliath.

h1556.definition: a primitive root; to roll (literally or figuratively); commit, remove, roll (away, down, together), run down, seek occasion, trust, wallow.

h1558.definition: from {{h1556}}; a circumstance (as rolled around); only used adverbially, on account of; because of, for (sake).

h1559.definition: from {{h1556}}, in the sense of {{h1560}}; great; Galal, the name of two Israelites; Galal.

h1560.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to {{h1556}}; weight or size (as if rolled); great.

h1561.definition: a variation of {{h1557}}; dung (plural balls of dung); dung.

h1562.definition: from {{h1561}}; dungy; Gilalai, an Israelite; Gilalai.

h1563.definition: a primitive root; to fold; wrap together.

h1564.definition: from {{h1563}}; a wrapped (and unformed mass, i.e. as the embryo); substance yet being unperfect.

h1565.definition: probably by prolonged from {{h1563}}; sterile (as wrapped up too hard); figuratively, desolate; desolate, solitary.

h1566.definition: a primitive root; to be obstinate; (inter-) meddle (with).

h1567.definition: from {{h1530}} and {{h5707}}; heap of testimony; Galed, a memorial cairn East of the Jordan; Galeed.

h1568.definition: probably from {{h1567}}; Gilad, a region East of the Jordan; also the name of three Israelites; Gilead, Gileadite.

h1569.definition: patronymically from {{h1568}}; a Giladite or descendant of Gilad; Gileadite.

h1570.definition: a primitive root; probably to caper (as a goat); appear.

h1571.definition: by contraction from an unused root meaning to gather; properly, assemblage; used only adverbially also, even, yea, though; often repeated as correl. both...and; again, alike, also, (so much) as (soon), both (so)...and, but, either...or, even, for all, (in) likewise (manner), moreover, nay...neither, one, then(-refore), though, what, with, yea.

h1572.definition: a primitive root (literally or figuratively) to absorb; to absorb; swallow, drink.

h1573.definition: from {{h1572}}; properly, an absorbent, i.e. the bulrush (from its porosity); specifically the papyrus; (bul-) rush.

h1574.definition: from an unused root apparently meaning to grasp; properly, a span; cubit.

h1575.definition: from the same as {{h1574}}; a warrior (as grasping weapons); Gammadims.

h1576.definition: from {{h1580}}; treatment, i.e. an act (of good or ill); by implication, service or requital; as hast served, benefit, desert, deserving, that which he hath given, recompense, reward.

h1577.definition: passive participle of {{h1580}}; rewarded; Gamul, an Israelite; Gamul. See also {{h1014}}.

h1578.definition: feminine of {{h1576}}; meaning the same; deed, recompense, such a reward.

h1579.definition: of uncertain derivation; Gimzo, a place in Palestine; Gimzo.

h1580.definition: a primitive root; to treat a person (well or ill), i.e. benefit or requite; by implication (of toil), to ripen, i.e. (specifically) to wean; bestow on, deal bountifully, do (good), recompense, requite, reward, ripen,   serve, mean, yield.

h1581.definition: apparently from {{h1580}} (in the sense of labor or burden-bearing); a camel; camel.

h1582.definition: probably from {{h1581}}; cameldriver; Gemalli, an Israelite; Gemalli.

h1583.definition: from {{h1580}} and {{h410}}; reward of God; Gamliel, an Israelite; Gamaliel.

h1584.definition: a primitive root; to end (in the sense of completion or failure); cease, come to an end, fail, perfect, perform.

h1586.definition: from {{h1584}}; completion; Gomer, the name of a son of Japheth and of his descendants; also of a Hebrewess; Gomer.

h1587.definition: or גְּמַרְיָהוּ; from {{h1584}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has perfected; Gemarjah, the name of two Israelites; Gemariah.

h1589.definition: a primitive root; to thieve (literally or figuratively); by implication, to deceive; carry away, × indeed, secretly bring, steal (away), get by stealth.

h1591.definition: from {{h1589}}; stealing, i.e. (concretely) something stolen; theft.

h1592.definition: from {{h1589}}; theft; Genubath, an Edomitish prince; Genubath.

h1595.definition: from an unused root meaning to store; treasure; by implication, a coffer; chest, treasury.

h1598.definition: a primitive root; to hedge about, i.e. (generally) protect; defend.

h1599.definition: or גִּנְּתוֹ; from {{h1598}}; gardener; Ginnethon or Ginnetho, an Israelite; Ginnetho, Ginnethon.

h1600.definition: a primitive root; to bellow (as cattle); low.
